DOC.brief_summary: Osteopathy alternative healthcare seem effective relieve pain patient . The main purpose study evaluate efficacy preoperative osteopathic care patient undergoing total knee arthroplasty ( TKA ) osteoarthritis . The secondary objective assess pain first postoperative month VAS knee function quality life 6 month 1 year . Our hypothesis osteopathy decrease postoperative pain increase knee function .
